title: ILinearPatternFeatureData.D1EndRefReverseOffset
description: Gets or sets whether to reverse the offset from the up-to-reference geometry in Direction 1 of this linear pattern feature.
returns: True to reverse ILinearPatternFeatureData::D1EndRefOffset from ILinearPatternFeatureData::D1EndReference , false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ILinearPatternFeatureData::D1EndCondition
is set to
swPatternEndCondition_e
.swPatternEndCondition_UpToReference.
